name: Temple Square
address: 50 N Temple, Salt Lake City, UT 84150
description: A 10-acre historic site at the heart of Salt Lake City, featuring beautiful gardens, fountains, and the iconic Salt Lake Temple.

name: Utah State Capitol
address: 350 State St, Salt Lake City, UT 84103
description: Perched on Capitol Hill, this neoclassical building offers panoramic city views and free guided tours.

name: Red Butte Garden
address: 300 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
description: A botanical garden and arboretum with themed gardens, hiking trails, and outdoor concerts in the summer.

name: Natural History Museum of Utah
address: 301 Wakara Way, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
description: Explore fascinating exhibits on Utahâ€™s geology, paleontology, and native cultures in a stunning modern building.

name: Hogle Zoo
address: 2600 Sunnyside Ave S, Salt Lake City, UT 84108
description: Home to over 800 animals, Hogle Zoo is a family favorite with engaging exhibits and conservation programs.

name: Liberty Park
address: 600 E 900 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84105
description: A lively urban park with a lake, aviary, playgrounds, and plenty of space for picnics and recreation.

name: The Leonardo Museum
address: 209 E 500 S, Salt Lake City, UT 84111
description: An innovative museum blending science, technology, and art with hands-on exhibits for all ages.

name: Great Salt Lake
description: The largest saltwater lake in the Western Hemisphere, famous for its unique ecosystem and breathtaking sunsets.
